txt.en: With Huorns in the area, there may be an Ent nearby.\n\nYou should find the Ent who herds this part of Fangorn.
Herehasen of Torsbury sent you into the eaves of Fangorn to uncover evidence of the evils he believes are gathering there.
Deal with the Black Huorns before they become uncontrollable
You have seen Black Huorns gathering in the shadows of the trees in Fangorn.\n\nYou should deal with them before they become uncontrollable.
You have seen Black Huorns gathering in the shadows of the trees in Fangorn.\n\nYou should deal with them before they become uncontrollable.
You have discovered a piece of black heartwood within a slain Huorn
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not bring harm to the Huorns who serve the Ents ([placeholder]/[placeholder])</rgb>

'Hoom, now, little one,  I see that you have discovered the Black Huorns that have crept out of the heart of the forest. These are wilder than the wildest I have ever seen...they heed not my voice and threaten harm to all who live....'
Bring the black heartwood you found to the Ent who herds this part of Fangorn
'Little folk do not belong in this wood....'
You have seen Black Huorns gathering in the shadows of the trees in Fangorn.\n\nYou should deal with them before they become uncontrollable.
